articles.body:
Hey there,

Welcome to The Emenent Times â€“ a site made by emenents for emenents.

Hereâ€™s what youâ€™ll find here:

  • Drive links loaded with study resources â€“ Because when the exam is tomorrow and youâ€™ve only attended class 'in spirit,' youâ€™ll thank us.
  • Blog posts â€“ Part survival guide, part therapy session, part rant about why MATLAB thinks itâ€™s funny.
  • Anonymous Rants â€“ Because no one should have to be alone. One small request though, keep the requests respectful or they wonâ€™t make it onto the site.
